statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.Name) as RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.SiteID , AA.Code , AA.Name , AA.Url , AA.ProductCount , AA.Description
, ISNULL(BB.ScrapProductCount, 0) as ScrapProductCount , ISNULL(BB.ScrapImageCount, 0) as ScrapImageCount
, ISNULL(BB.GenderMen, 0) as GenderMen , ISNULL(BB.GenderFemale, 0) as GenderFemale , ISNULL(BB.GenderUnisex, 0) as GenderUnisex
FROM dbo.TScrapBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT AA.SiteID , AA.BrandCode , COUNT(AA.ID) as ScrapProductCount , SUM(BB.ImageCount) as ScrapImageCount , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.Gender = 'M' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as GenderMen , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.Gender = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as GenderFemale , SUM(CASE WHEN AA.Gender = 'U' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS GenderUnisex FROM dbo.TScrapProduct AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ProductID , COUNT(*) as ImageCount FROM dbo.TScrapProductImage WITH (NOLOCK) GROUP BY ProductID ) BB ON AA.ID = BB.ProductID WHERE AA.SiteID = #SiteID# GROUP BY AA.SiteID, AA.BrandCode ) BB ON AA.SiteID = BB.SiteID AND AA.Code = BB.BrandCode WHERE AA.SiteID = #SiteID#
AND ISNULL(BB.ScrapProductCount, 0) != AA.ProductCount
AND ISNULL(BB.ScrapProductCount, 0) = AA.ProductCount
AND ( AA.Code = #FindText# OR AA.Name LIKE '%'+#FindText#+'%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TScrapBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TScrapBrand SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, SiteID = #SiteID# , Code = #Code# , Name = #Name# , Url = #Url# , ProductCount = #ProductCount# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
